verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> as he had <S%H559>said,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> as he had <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>

For <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> in his <S%H2208>old<s%> age, at the <S%H4150>set<s%> time of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to him.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son<s%> that was <S%H3205>born<s%> to him, <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to him, <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> being <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> was an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> when his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H3205>born<s%> to him.
And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has made me to <S%H6712>laugh,<s%> so that <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8085>hear<s%> will <S%H6711>laugh<s%> with me.

And she <S%H4448>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> would have <S%H4448>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> that <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> should have given <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H3243>suck?<s%> for I have <S%H3205>born<s%> him a <S%H1121>son<s%> in his <S%H2208>old<s%> age.

And the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and was <S%H1580>weaned:<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4960>feast<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> was <S%H1580>weaned.<s%>
And <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she had <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H6711>mocking.<s%>

Why she <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H1644>Cast<s%> out <S%H2063>this<s%> female <S%H519>slave<s%> and her <S%H1121>son:<s%> for the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2063>this<s%> female <S%H519>slave<s%> shall not be <S%H3423>heir<s%> with my son, even with <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7489>grievous<s%> in <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H5869>sight<s%> <S%H2921>because<s%> <S%H182><s%> of his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> Let it not be <S%H7489>grievous<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> and <S%H5921>because<s%> of your female <S%H519>slave;<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H8085>listen<s%> to her <S%H6963>voice;<s%> for in <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> shall your <S%H2233>seed<s%> be <S%H7121>called.<s%>
And also of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the female <S%H519>slave<s%> will I <S%H7760>make<s%> a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he is your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and a <S%H2573>bottle<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to <S%H1904>Hagar,<s%> <S%H7760>putting<s%> it <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> and the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> her away: and she <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H8582>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>
And the <S%H4325>water<s%> was <S%H3615>spent<s%> in the <S%H2573>bottle,<s%> and she <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H7880>shrubs.<s%>

And she <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> her down <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> him a <S%H7368>good<s%> way off, as it were a bow <S%H2909>shot:<s%> <S%H7198><s%> for she <S%H559>said,<s%> Let me not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H3206>child.<s%> And she <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> him, and <S%H5375>lift<s%> up her <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad;<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> out of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H4100>What<s%> ails you, <S%H1904>Hagar?<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> not; for <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> he is.
<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up the <S%H5288>lad,<s%> and <S%H2388>hold<s%> him in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> for I will <S%H7760>make<s%> him a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6491>opened<s%> her <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and she <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water;<s%> and she <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H2573>bottle<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> and gave the <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H8248>drink.<s%>
And <S%H430>God<s%> was with the <S%H5288>lad;<s%> and he <S%H1431>grew,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> an <S%H7198>archer.<s%>

And he <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him a <S%H802>wife<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> that <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> and <S%H6369>Phichol<s%> the chief <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>host<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is with you in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H6213>do:<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H7650>swear<s%> to me <S%H2008>here<s%> by <S%H430>God<s%> that you will not deal <S%H8266>falsely<s%> with me, nor with my <S%H5220>son,<s%> nor with my <S%H5220>son's<s%> <S%H5220>son:<s%> but according to the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> that I have <S%H6213>done<s%> to you, you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to me, and to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> you have <S%H1481>sojourned.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I will <S%H7650>swear.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3198>reproved<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H182><s%> of a <S%H875>well<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> had <S%H1497>violently<s%> <S%H1497>taken<s%> away.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> not <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> did you <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1571>yet<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> I of it, but to <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to <S%H40>Abimelech;<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5324>set<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3535>ewe<s%> <S%H3535>lambs<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> by themselves.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> mean these <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3535>ewe<s%> <S%H3535>lambs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H5324>set<s%> by themselves?

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> For these <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3535>ewe<s%> <S%H3535>lambs<s%> shall you <S%H3947>take<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that they may be a <S%H5713>witness<s%> to me, that I have <S%H2658>dig<s%> this <S%H875>well.<s%>
<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>called<s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H884>Beersheba;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H7650>swore<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them.

Thus they <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> at <S%H884>Beersheba:<s%> then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up, and <S%H6369>Phichol<s%> the chief <S%H8269>captain<s%> of his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and they <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H815>grove<s%> in <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in the Philistines' <S%H6430><s%><S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
